questions:

B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A bird near water

B) A duck
C) A person
D) A building

A) A tree
B) A bridge
C) A duck
D) A rock

A) Mountains
B) Water
C) Buildings
D) Trees

B) Grass
C) Sand
D) Flowers

B) Swimming
C) Standing by the water
D) Eating

A) White and black
B) Brown
C) Green
D) Yellow
